title: The history of the intrigues & gallantries of Christina, Queen of Sweden, and of her court whilst she was at Rome faithfully render'd into English from the French original.
author: Franckenstein, Christian Gottfried, 1661-1717.
notes: Translation of: Histoire des intrigues galantes de la reine Christine de Suède et de sa cour, pendant son séjour à Rome.
Dedication of the original translation of 1697 signed by the translator: Phil. Hollingworth.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
